paragraph: We're introducing new ways to ride starting February 1st!
Learn More
We're introducing new ways to ride starting February 1st!
Learn More
We're introducing new ways to ride starting February 1st!
Get Started
LEARN MORE
LEARN MORE
Pick up a bike at one of hundreds of stations around the Chicago area. See bike availability on the System Map or mobile app.
Take as many short rides as you want while your pass is active. Passes and memberships include unlimited 30-min rides.
End a ride by returning your bike to any station. Slide your bike firmly into an empty dock and wait for the green light to make sure it's locked.
January 24, 2018
Divvy just got even better. Read more
“Biking is such a fun alternative to other forms of transportation! And Divvy makes it incredibly convenient.﻿”
“I take Divvy to work and school – it's faster, cheaper and far more convenient than riding the bus.”
“I use Divvy to connect to the train – it's a full 20 minutes faster than the bus could get me there.”
“Divvy is the fastest way to get 'diagonally' in this grid city!”
“Divvy is SO much more flexible than riding my own bike – I love that it doesn't chain me to a bike when I'm meeting friends.”
“I love the convenience of having access to a bike anytime I want one.”
“I live in an apartment without an elevator and love that I don't have to carry a greasy bike up the stairs after work.”
“I don't have to do maintenance. I don't have to lock a bike up. I can ride a bike one-way to my destination.”
